previewLimitReached: This preview is limited to 10 KiB. Click the download button to access the full file.
localDatastoreDescription: Total size of all blocks currently stored in the Datastore of your IPFS node (â€œRepoSizeâ€ from â€œipfs repo statâ€). This includes everything in the Files view (MFS), low-level pins, and any recently removed or temporary cached blocks that were not garbage-collected yet.
currentLocationDescription: Total size of the DAG behind the current directory (â€œCumulativeSizeâ€ from â€œipfs files statâ€). This value includes both local and remote blocks, and could be bigger than the size of your local datastore.
